thread.title: Jack Eichel gets a burger named after him
thread.title_full: Jack Eichel gets a burger named after him

title: Jack Eichel gets a burger named after him
text:
Jack Eichel gets a burger named after him FOX Sports 
Oct 5, 2015 at 3:21p ET + 
Jack Eichel finally got a burger named after him. It only took a couple of preseason games. Eliot J. Schechter / Getty Images FOX Sports   3:22p ET 
When you go to the First Niagara Center, you'll be able to watch a generational phenom play hockey, while eating a phenomenal burger. 
The Buffalo Sabres named a burger after their rookie, and it looks really, really good, but it also sounds really, really bad for you. 
The burger is called the "Eike Daddy Burger," and it features a burger on a Bioche Roll, one beef patty, american cheese, lettuce, two tomato slices, a fried egg, onions, Guacamole and thousand island dressing. true . @Jack_Eichel11 already has a burger named after him! @delawarenorth has introduced the Eike Daddy at Sabres games. pic.twitter.com/b5l2DbOyWK â€” BU Men's Hockey (@TerrierHockey) October 5, 2015 
Bleh that sounds like a lot to handle.
